title: He's the Famous Detective
description: How Sherlock Hound first met Watson.

title: The Kidnapping Case of Mrs. Hudson
Blue Ruby
description: Prof. Moriarty steals the Blue Carbuncle, but got robbed by a pickpocket.

title: Solve the Mystery of the Green Balloon!
description: A green balloon containing a distress call from a family in need of help.

title: The Great Chase of the Little Detectives
description: Prof. Moriarty steals a golden statuette and hides it somewhere on the boats near the docks.

title: The Speckled Band
description: A rainstorm sends Hound and Watson to a mysterious house.

title: Treasure Under the Sea
description: Prof. Moriarty stole a submarine from the navy, and is using it to steal the recently discovered ship hoard of Napoleon's Treasure.

title: The Air Battle Over Dover!
description: The air post isn't doing well due to a lot of planes being sabotaged. After Mrs. Hudson saved a pilot's life, she, Hound, & Watson set out to investigate.

title: The Targeted Giant Coin Bank
description: Hound and Watson visit a dreary town to investigate the missing sovereign gold coins own by the richest man in town.

title: The Professor's Big Failure in the Storm!!
description: Hound and Watson were called to protect a girl's father who's delivering money by carriage from Prof. Moriarty.

title: Missing Freight Car!? The Professor's Big Magic Trick
description: A freight car containing crates of gold bars has mysteriously disappeared from between the other freight cars. Hound must figure out where the freight car is.

title: Gourmet! The Coral Lobsters
description: Prof. Moriarty has stolen the Coral Lobsters after having a craving idea for having actual lobsters for meal time.

title: Look! The Shining Thief
description: Prof. Moriarty steals gold bullion bars from the bank and kidnaps a sculptor for making a statue of his own kind.

title: The Magic Castle! Holmes, Dead or Alive?
description: The Sacred Cross Sword contains the key in finding the treasure at Stone Hedge.

title: The Monster of the Thames River
description: There have been reports of ships attacked by a monster at the Thames River. Hound and Watson went to investigate the river.

title: Blundered Operation at Loch Ness!
description: Three french students were kidnapped by Prof. Moriarty and are forced to make paintings so he could sell them off at auctions.

title: The Soseki Kite Battle Over London!
description: The Rosetta Stone (A stone with 4 countries connected to it) mysteriously floats away from the museum.

title: Chase the Airship White Silver!
description: Moriarty plans to smuggle acquired gold coins with the help of a new airship.

title: Buzz Buzz! The Fly Fly Mecha Operation
description: There's a thief roaming around England, and it's not Moriarty.

title: Grand Flight Championship of Chaos!?
description: Moriarty steals a plane engine for an advantage in competing a race.

title: Game of Wits! Parrot vs Professor
description: The answer lies within a parrot.

title: Listen! The Tribute to Moriarty
description: Moriarty steals the one and only Big Ben bell.

title: Chaos! The Doll Swap Case
description: A jewel is secretly inside an ordinary doll.

title: Good-bye Holmes! The Last Case
description: Sherlock's next case is involved with love affairs.
